reviewText: A great DVD about the author, Bram Stoker.  The high school students enjoyed this biography.

This is a worthwhile DVD to own for fans of Dracula or author Bram Stoker.  The background about Stoker touches competently on the main points of his life and snippets of interviews with significant Dracula scholars are included.  It is also visually appealing and fast-paced enough to show in a classroom.  The main negative aspect of the DVD is the inclusion of a bit on real-life vampires that I think was intended to come across comically, but is just silly (Stoker is likely rolling in his grave that this was included in his bio ...)
